text: David Cecil MacAlister Tomlinson (7 May 1917 â€“ 24 June 2000) was an English actor and comedian. He was known for playing George Banks in Mary Poppins, Professor Emelius Browne in Bedknobs and Broomsticks and Peter Thorndyke in The Love Bug. Tomlinson was born in Henley-on-Thames, Oxfordshire. Tomlinson died on 24 June 2000 from a stroke in London, aged 83. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English radio actors Category:English voice actors Category:Comedians from Kent Category:Actors from Kent Category:Actors from Oxfordshire
title: David Tomlinson
